title: The Best Strategy
body:
I believe a league game is won by knowledge, not practice! 
Learn all your opponents attacks, even the ones you hate playing against.
Learn how effective they are, if you can prevent or change this in anyway
With this watch your opponents very carefully,  the items they are buying, where you think they might be and what you think they might be doing there.
Scare your enemies, However this doesn't mean taunting them ridiculously, i would be the first to hit a minion and strike at a time i'm still thinking of level 2! A good team battle before game determines the kind of strategy your team will place, you will learn a few things, your opponents courage and how strong they will be in a team fight. This way you will need to change the way you will play your champion! 
Your enemy might be a lot more powerful than you, with good teamwork you can always get each others backs
Don't fight like rivals with your allies, fight like legends! 
Other tips that are just too important are Warding, scouting, vision,items,runes,attack and spell ratios with champion stats!
I would Remember to go in early. By this getting the first blood or first minion marathon before level 6 might be the easiest way to get a head start!

replies.body: Just watch the finals of a tournament. No one will be able to react to such a strategy in a normal game.

You get knowledge with practice. You need to practice because if u go into a game as first time zed, pretty sure u will do horribly. Even if you know all his skills you cant just play him with perfection without practice
